user_instruction: 'Send an update to the Academic Alliance (academicalliance@university.edu) about our next study session. You can check out my Gmail and Jane'"'"'s Genius Planner for information.'

formatted_items.content:
To: academicalliance@university.edu  
Subject: Quick Confirmation Needed for Our Upcoming Study Session  

Hi everyone,

I hope you’re all doing well! According to the latest notes in Jane’s Genius Planner and the thread in my Gmail, our next Academic Alliance study session is set for:

Date: Wednesday, 20 September  
Time: 4:00 – 6:00 p.m.  
Location: Main Library, Room 305  

Could you please:  
1. Confirm whether you’ll be able to attend.  
2. Let me know any specific topics, questions, or problem sets you’d like us to focus on.  
3. Flag any scheduling conflicts or materials you may need in advance.

A quick reply by Monday evening would be perfect so I can finalize the agenda and circulate any prep materials.

Feel free to double-check the details in Jane’s Genius Planner, and of course the latest thread in Gmail, if you need a refresher.

Thank you, and looking forward to another productive session together!

Best,  
Jane

final_output:
